/* Adm_TestId.xml - getTestIdList */ select test.emp_no , test.emp_name , test.relation , test.is_admin , mem.mem_no , mem.mem_userid , mem.mem_userId , mem.mem_nick , mem.mem_sex , mem.mem_birth_year , mem.mem_birth_month , mem.mem_birth_day , concat((date_format(now(),'%Y') - mem_birth_year) + 1,'') as koreanAge , mem.mem_phone , mem.mem_state , DATE_FORMAT(test.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date , level.level , level.grade , DATE_FORMAT((select max(session.last_upd_date) from rd_data.tb_member_session session where session.mem_no = mem.mem_no), "%Y.%m.%d %T") lastLoginDatetime , wallet.ruby as dal , wallet.gold as byeol , (select DATE_FORMAT(last_upd_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') from rd_data.tb_member_profile_edit_history where mem_no = mem.mem_no and `type` = 0 order by last_upd_date desc limit 1) as lastOpDate from rd_data.tb_member_basic mem , rd_admin.tb_admin_test_account test , rd_data.tb_member_level level , rd_data.tb_member_wallet wallet where mem.mem_no = test.mem_no and mem.mem_no = level.mem_no and mem.mem_no = wallet.mem_no
AND (test.emp_name like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') or lpad(test.emp_no,5,'0') like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') or mem.mem_no like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') or mem.mem_userid like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') or mem.mem_nick like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') or mem.mem_phone like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%'))
AND test.emp_name like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND mem.mem_no like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND mem.mem_userid like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND mem.mem_nick like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND mem.mem_phone like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND test.is_admin = #{search_adminId}
order by test.reg_date desc

select '달' as `type` ,ruby as charge ,DATE_FORMAT(last_upd_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as chargeDate ,op_name as lastOpName from rd_data.tb_member_wallet_ruby where mem_no=#{mem_no} and `type` in (1,7) and op_name is not null union select '별' as `type` ,gold as charge ,DATE_FORMAT(last_upd_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as chargeDate ,op_name as lastOpName from rd_data.tb_member_wallet_gold where mem_no=#{mem_no} and `type` in (1,7) and op_name is not null order by chargeDate desc limit 1
